alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 14 at 5:43AM CST until January 14 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, north winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Coastal Kleberg, Coastal Nueces and Coastal San Patricio Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 8 AM CST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 3 AM to 6 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio
